title: Stability / Swiss / Exercise Ball Crunches
description: Place your hands loosely behind or on the sides on the sides of your head, but donâ€™t use your them to pull yourself up. Doing so can cause neck injuries. Curl your upper body forward rolling your shoulders forward and down towards your hips. Continue curling forward as far as comfortable. Hold and squeeze your abdominal muscles for a count of one. Return to the starting position and pause, then repeat. For added resistance,you can hold a weight plate to your chest.
